title: Here’s how you can help shape the sustainable homes of the future
content:
In the past, when we thought about the homes of the future, our wildest fantasies often conjured images of a Jetsons-style smart home with a garage for our hover cars, conveyor belt walkways, robotic maids, and a kitchen that prepares full five-course meals with the click of a few buttons. Today, while futuristic gadgets will still have a place, the focus for the homes of the future is on sustainability. It’s not a question of, “what kind of world are we leaving to our children or grandchildren?” Climate change is happening in front of our eyes. And, if we don’t…
